text:
"Whose Line is it Anyway?" is a United States comedy television show that ran from 1998 to 2007. A revival premiered in 2013. It was presented by Drew Carey on the ABC network, with the revival hosted by Aisha Tyler and airing on The CW network. The design of the show came from a British television of the same name.
The show consisted of a group of four people acting out comedy sketches on-the-spot, with Aisha Tyler choosing what they would do with help of the live audience.
